column4: can someone help me with my webcam, it is responding with "Cannot identify device '/dev/video0'."? and it is recognized by my computer in lsusb
is it the correct device name?
what do you mean by the correct device name? it's probably not
i just don't know what to change it to
go into you /dev/ and look for "video0"
does anything with the prefix "video" exist?
but it was working earlier in the month, i think it broke after i updated or something...
what model computer do you have?
it has always worked before whenever i upgrade
try googling your problem in reference with ubuntu
ill see what i can find
yeah that's what i've been doing
so this one site said to try dmesg | tail -n 20 and see what it gets
everywhere i seem to look says reinstall >-< i can't do that
